name: Power Jam: Roller Derby (Canceled)
blurb: Create your own league and take to the track in the world\u2019s most authentic Roller Derby video game.

rewards.reward: No Reward

DERBY EVANGELIST: While in return for your pledge you will receive no physical reward, your selfless gesture of support will aid derby reach a new audience, helping the sport gain the notoriety that it deserves. Thank you!
DERBY LOVE! A heart-felt 'Thank You!' on Twitter and an immense sense of pride that you have supported the game.
Shop Til You Drop Pack! \u00a320 worth of in-game currency to use on any derby gear in our virtual shop. Also an exclusive to Kickstarter free virtual gift!
INDIVIDUAL PACK 1: Digital download of the game.
INDIVIDUAL PACK 2: Digital art book featuring the artwork from the game, in-game bonus and digital download of the game.

GET YOUR SKATES ON! PACK - Exclusive Kickstarter- only Skates \u2013 These skates will allow you have an increased speed for a period of time in every bout \u2013 PLUS \u00a320 worth of in-game currency, digital download of the artbook and a digital copy of the game
INDIVIDUAL PACK 3: Include your Roller Derby name in the game database of skaters, digital art book featuring the artwork from the game, in-game bonus and digital download of the game.

INDIVIDUAL PACK 4: Early access to the Beta test of the game, include your Roller Derby name in the game, digital art book featuring the artwork from the game, in-game bonus and digital download of the game.
MASCOT PACK - Customisable virtual mascot - Exclusive to Kickstarter backers only!! Plus exclusive skates, \u00a320 worth of in-game currency, digital artbook and a digital download of the game
BOXED PACK 1: Box copy of the game (including digital art book).
TEAM PACK - 5 digital copies of the game, for you to share with your team-mates and friends, plus 5 x digital art book, 5 x exclusive in-game skates
BOXED PACK 2:  Include your Roller Derby name in the game, box copy of the game (including digital art book).

ALPHA PACK - Exclusive early access to the Alpha test of the game, include your Roller Derby name in the game, digital art book featuring the artwork from the game, in-game bonus and digital download of the game.
BOXED PACK 3: Exclusive Power Jam T-shirt & badge pack, include your Roller Derby name in the game, box copy of the game (including digital art book).

SIGNATURE PACK: Name one of the arenas featured in the game, exclusive Hall of Fame inclusion (a special thank you area in the game, open to only our top supporters), early access to the Beta test of the game, derby name included in the game, digital art book, in-game bonus and a digital copy of the game.

BOXED PACK 4: Exclusive limited edition framed art work, limited edition physical copy of the art book, early access to the Beta test of the game, T-shirt & badge pack, name included in the game plus a box copy of the game.

EARLY BIRD EASTER SPECIAL! LEAGUE PACK : Include your league in the game plus x5 digital copies of the game, x5 early Beta access, x5 digital copies of the art book and x5 derby names included in the game.

EARLY BIRD EASTER SPECIAL! LEADER OF THE PACK PACK -  Have your likeness recreated in the game. Our artists will work from photographs provided to model your character in-game. Plus, Hall of Fame induction, early Beta access to the game, derby name in the game, digital art book, in-game bonus and a digital copy of the game.
LEAGUE PACK: Include your league in the game plus x5 digital copies of the game, x5 early Beta access, x5 digital copies of the art book and x5 derby names included in the game.

LEADER OF THE PACK PACK: Have your likeness recreated in the game. Our artists will work from photographs provided to model your character in-game. Plus, Hall of Fame induction, early Alpha access to the game, derby name in the game, digital art book, in-game bonus and a digital copy of the game.

EARLY BIRD SUPER STORE PACK: Have your branding used in-game. Your company logo will be prominently visible during gameplay within one of the game's arenas, along with in-game clickable links to your company website. You'll also receive a digital download version of the game. Limited, discounted version of "Super Store Pack".

SUPER STORE PACK: Have your branding used in-game. Your company logo will be prominently visible during gameplay within one of the game's arenas, along with in-game clickable links to your company website. You'll also receive a digital download version of the game.
